channel.title: Dwarf Mutilcannon 718

item.title: Dwarf Mutilcannon 718
item.dc:creator: @Sir_wootness Sir wootness
item.description:
@Sir_wootness wrote:

Ok so for the past week Iâ€™ve been trying to figure out how to get this to work and I get one error -.-

here is the code for it:
this is in my InventoryOptionsHandler.java for when I click on the Cannon base.

if (itemId == 6 && player.getInventory().containsItem(8, 1) && player.getInventory().containsItem(10, 1) && player.getInventory().containsItem(12, 1)) {
			DwarfCannon.setUpCannon();

			return;
}

here is the error:

src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers\InventoryOptionsHandler.java:168 error: non-static method setUpCannon() cannot be referenced from a static context
DwarfCannon.setUpCannon();

What should I change it to so I can actually get this thing up and running?
As soon as i fix this error I am releasing the whole cannon code for 718/728 I need help guys.

Read full topic
